DataListSpec.Name: Recurring Gift Conversion Issues Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Active Sponsorships with Recurring Gifts that are not active or held
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_DATALIST_CONVERSION_ACTIVESPONSORSHIPSINACTIVERG(@CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier) as set nocount on;
select SPONSORSHIP.ID, SPONSORSHIP.CONSTITUENTID, (select NAME from dbo.UFN_CONSTITUENT_DISPLAYNAME (SPONSORSHIP.CONSTITUENTID)) as CONSTITUENTNAME, SPONSORSHIP.STATUS as SPONSORSHIPSTATUS, REVENUESCHEDULE.STATUS as RECURRINGGIFTSTATUS from dbo.SPONSORSHIP join dbo.REVENUESPLIT on REVENUESPLIT.ID = SPONSORSHIP.REVENUESPLITID join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE on REVENUESCHEDULE.ID = REVENUESPLIT.REVENUEID join financialtransaction ft on ft.ID = REVENUESCHEDULE.ID where sponsorship.statuscode = 1 and REVENUESCHEDULE.STATUSCODE in (2,3)
